effect.shortEffect: Raises this Pokémon's highest stat by one stage when it faints another Pokémon.
effect.full: Raises this Pokémon's highest stat by one stage when it faints another Pokémon.

description.sun-moon: The Pokémon boosts its most proficient stat each time it knocks out a Pokémon.
